utils.title: HOPE
utils.par-1: Hope is the thing with feathers -
utils.par-3: And sings the tune without the words -
utils.par-5: And sweetest - in the Gale - is heard -
utils.par-6: And sore must be the storm -
utils.par-7: That could abash the little Bird
utils.par-9: Iâ€™ve heard it in the chillest land -
utils.par-12: It asked a crumb - of me.
